short_summary: Request for Standing Offer:Boxes of personal effects and packaging for national depot.
description: boxes of personal effects that are provided to all establishments in the Quebec region used for the transfer of inmates  as well as boxes of packaging for the needs of the operations of the national depot

full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**

### Project Title and Reference Number
**Title**: Provision of Personal Effect Boxes and Packaging Materials for National Depot
**Reference Number**: WS3782349822-Doc3782565119

### Tender Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified suppliers to bid on a Request for Standing Offer (RFO) for the procurement of boxes of personal effects and packaging materials for the National Depot.

**Project Details**

* **UNSPC Code**: 24121500 (Packaging boxes and bags and pouches)
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Notice Type**: Request for Standing Offer

### Key Dates
* **Tender Closing Date**: January 11, 2023, 2 PM EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: February 1, 2023

### Tender Requirements

Applicants must submit their bid, including all required supporting documentation, by the tender closing date. Any bids submitted after the deadline will be deemed non-responsive.

### End User

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) is the end user for this project.

### Contact Information

* **Procurement Contact**: Stephane Dube, PSPC, at stephane.dube@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, Canada

### Notice URL and Attachments

No URL or attachments are provided with this notice.
